ai.grakn.graql.internal.query.aggregate

Class Aggregates

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.grakn.graql.internal.query.aggregate.Aggregates

  • public class Aggregates
extends Object
    Factory for making Aggregate implementations.
    Author:
    Felix Chapman
